Title: Law of Gravity
Plot: Grissom returns from his sabbatical; Keppler is put into a compromising position when the bodies of a Trenton police officer and a hooker are found in a hotel room. The man who found them is a retired New Jersey cop and close friend to Keppler, who doesn't reveal their relationship.
GuestStars: Toy Connor, Kayla Mae Maloney, James Hiroyuki Liao, Shacolby Randell, Len Cariou, Larry Mitchell, Jared Krikac, Liz Vassey, Liev Schreiber, John Everlove
